org.apache.accumulo.core.client.lexicoder

Interface Encoder<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TypedValueCombiner.Encoder<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Lexicoder<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigIntegerLexicoder, BytesLexicoder, DateLexicoder, DoubleLexicoder, IntegerLexicoder, ListLexicoder, LongLexicoder, PairLexicoder, ReverseLexicoder, StringLexicoder, TextLexicoder, UIntegerLexicoder, ULongLexicoder, UUIDLexicoder

    public interface Encoder<T>
extends TypedValueCombiner.Encoder<T>
    An encoder represents a typed object that can be encoded/decoded to/from a byte array.
    Since:
    1.6.0

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.accumulo.core.iterators.TypedValueCombiner.Encoder
